metadata.title: CVE-2016-6342 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
elog 3.1.1 allows remote attackers to post data as any username in thelogbook.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6342` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elog - 3.1.2-1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elog package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-1-1').
